FHIR R4 Core Prototype Implementation Guide - November 2019 Release. Based on FHIR Version 4.0.1
Note: this is an initial prototype specification.

FHIR R4 Core Prototype Implementation Guide - November 2019 Release

This is a development test build and should be considered as “work in progress”. The content can change on a daily basis. This implementation guide is not an official product release and nothing contained in this specification should be seen as approved.

​More information can be found in the Guidance section.

Published by NHS Digital nhsdigital.fhir.r4.core.prototype# based on FHIR 4.0.1 created 2019-11-21.
